message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $180 and $120. How about we try $150?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $130?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession. How about we try $140?
I'm still really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget. Can we meet in the middle again? How about $125?
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $135?
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, but I still really want the product. Can we meet at $120?
I understand you're getting frustrated, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $130?
